title: Login button not working
description: Customer reports that clicking the login button does not redirect to the dashboard.

title: Page not loading on Safari
description: User reports that the homepage remains blank when opened in Safari browser.

title: Password reset email not received
description: Customer requested a password reset but never got the email link.

title: Broken image on product page
description: The product thumbnail image is not displaying correctly for product ID #4502.

title: Error 500 on checkout
description: Customer reports receiving a server error while trying to complete a purchase.

title: Profile picture upload fails
description: Upload button does not respond when attempting to change profile picture.

title: Notifications not updating
description: Bell icon shows no updates even though new messages are received.

title: Search function returns no results
description: Customer tried searching for 'laptop' but no products are returned.

title: Slow page loading
description: Pages take more than 12 seconds to load on a stable WiFi connection.

title: Duplicate order placed
description: Customer reports that clicking 'Place Order' twice created two orders.

title: Live chat not connecting
description: User is unable to connect to the support agent via live chat.

title: App crashes on login
description: Mobile app closes immediately after entering login credentials.

title: Invoice PDF not generating
description: Customer cannot download their purchase invoice as PDF.

title: Wishlist not saving items
description: Customer adds items to wishlist but they disappear after refresh.
